description:
Do you want to leave your dead-end job but fear that you can't earn a great income to sustain your lifestyle?  You Are In the Right Place because this brand new online course by Louise Anne Maurice of Wealth Coach Academy called Lifestyle Business: Become a Life Coach Work from Home was created for you!  Keep reading..

Maybe you are at that point in your life where you want to stop the 9-5 grind, stop wasting hours of your life in rush hour traffic and stop doing things you hate just to make a buck.  

I know that is how I felt and becoming a Life Coach was the perfect solution.

The problem is Life Coach Certification Courses don’t teach enough about the business or money side of coaching.  They don't teach you how to have a lifestyle business.

Wealth Coach Academy has helped many new Life Coaches and Certified Life Coaches from other programs feel competent with the business of Life Coaching.

Plus with me as your guide, you will experience less stress and more confidence dealing with the sales, marketing and money side of Life Coaching.

This course is a perfect blend of a high-level training seminar and hands-on workshop, I developed this course to be a $149 value.

By the end of this course you’ll know how to implement proven techniques plus much more.

The usual approach to starting a Life Coaching Lifestyle Business doesn’t work for some people.

In this course I walk you through my 7 part in-depth WEALTHY Framework for building a successful Life Coaching Empire.  

I then show you exactly how to apply this framework to have the lifestyle business that makes money and makes a positive difference

My WEALTHY framework works even with Life Coaches who have been coaching for years yet are struggling financially.

This course is ideal if you want the simple lifestyle business blueprint and an easy step-by-step plan to follow

As a bonus, you walk away with extra resources and a 46 page manual complete with usable activities to keep as your guide plus lifetime access to coaching and consulting – all from your one-time low course enrollment fee. 

Click on the "START LEARNING NOW" button and begin the journey to becoming a successful Life Coach the Wealth Coach Academy way.
title: Lifestyle Business: Become a Life Coach Work From Home
instructors: Wealth Coach Academy, Louise Anne Maurice
